https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kk6Rrwh0toMz9tjuUHdS4O3v2Rk.jpg Based on the famous book by Jules Verne the movie follows Phileas Fogg on his journey around the world. Which has to be completed within 80 days, a very short period for those days. Around the World in Eighty Days
